meanings.definition: To dress or adorn oneself in a stylish or attractive manner.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys dolling up for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: She is dolling up for the party tonight.
meanings.sent3: After dolling up, she felt confident and ready to impress.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was dolling her up like a glamorous movie star.
meanings.sent5: The act of dolling up transformed her into a radiant beauty.

meanings.definition: To make someone or something appear more attractive or appealing.
meanings.sent1: He is dolling the room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: The makeup artist is dolling up the model for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: The chef was dolling up the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight was dolling up the garden with a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The new paint color was dolling up the walls beautifully.

meanings.definition: To engage in activities related to dolls or doll-making.
meanings.sent1: She spends her weekends dolling with her collection.
meanings.sent2: The children were happily dolling together in the playroom.
meanings.sent3: The dolling club meets every Saturday to share tips and tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for dolling shines through her intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The art of dolling brings joy and creativity to many enthusiasts.
